DAC.alias: TODO: Submitter designated name for the DAC. The name must be unique within the submission account
DAC.center_name: TODO: The center name (acronym) of the submitter's account
DAC.broker_name: TODO: The center name (its acronym) of the broker if applicable, if not, remove this attribute (broker_name)
DAC.TITLE: Short text that can be used to call out DAC records in searches or in displays.

CONTACT.name: TODO: Name of contact person for this DAC
CONTACT.email: TODO: email of the person to contact
CONTACT.telephone_number: TODO: telephone number of the person to contact
CONTACT.organisation: TODO: name of organisation contact affiliated to
CONTACT.main_contact: TODO: boolean (true/false) - If true then this is the main contact

DAC_ATTRIBUTE.TAG: TODO: Name of the custom attribute (e.g. "ENA-SUBMISSION-TOOL")
DAC_ATTRIBUTE.VALUE: TODO: Value of the custom attribute (e.g. "SRA-Webin")
DAC_ATTRIBUTE.UNITS: TODO: Optional scientific units of the custom attribute
